text:
e="preserve">Crown Prince Uiso (hangul:의소세자 hanja:懿昭世子; 27 September 1750 - 17 April 1752) was a royal family member of Korea Joseon dynastys.His real name is Yi Jeong(hangul:이정 hanja:李琔).
He was born in the Changkyeong palace in Hanseong. He was the first son of Crown Prince Sado and Lady Hyegyeong.
He died when he was three years old.
